title: Change Data Type

codeSnippets.code: import pandas as pd  def changeDatatype(students: pd.DataFrame) -> pd.DataFrame:

content: DataFrame students +-------------+--------+ | Column Name | Type   | +-------------+--------+ | student_id  | int    | | name        | object | | age         | int    | | grade       | float  | +-------------+--------+  Write a solution to correct the errors: The grade column is stored as floats,convert it to integers. The result format is in the following example.   Example 1: Input: DataFrame students: +------------+------+-----+-------+ | student_id | name | age | grade | +------------+------+-----+-------+ | 1          | Ava  | 6   | 73.0  | | 2          | Kate | 15  | 87.0  | +------------+------+-----+-------+ Output: +------------+------+-----+-------+ | student_id | name | age | grade | +------------+------+-----+-------+ | 1          | Ava  | 6   | 73    | | 2          | Kate | 15  | 87    | +------------+------+-----+-------+ Explanation:  The data types of the column grade is converted to int.
